wrest.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to take power or influence away from someone, especially when this is difficult
wrest.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They are fighting to wrest control of the party from the old leaders.
wrest.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to pull something away from someone violently
wrest.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: I managed to wrest the photograph from his grasp.
